#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
inline void scanint(int* x)
{
	register char c = getchar_unlocked();
	*x = 0;
	for(; (c<48)||(c>57);c = getchar_unlocked());
	for(; (c>47)&&(c<58);c = getchar_unlocked())
		*x = (long long int)((((*x)<<1) + ((*x)<<3)) + c - 48);
}
 
inline void printint(int n)
{
	if(n == 0)
	{
		putchar_unlocked('0');
		putchar_unlocked('\n');
	}
	else
	{
		char buf[20];
		buf[19] = '\n';
		int i = 18;
		while(n)
		{
			buf[i--] = n % 10 + '0';
			n /= 10;
		}
		while(buf[i] != '\n')
			putchar_unlocked(buf[++i]);
	}	
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	string num;
	scanint(&t);
	while (t--)
	{
		int carry=0;
		cin>>num;
		int len=num.size()-1;
		for (int i=len; i>=0; i--)
		{
			if (num[i]=='7')
			{
				num[i]='4';
				carry=1;
			}
			else
			{
				num[i]='7';
				carry=0;
				break;
			}
		}
		if (carry) cout<<"4";
		cout<<num;
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
	
}
